name: Create Course Wizard
description: Guided setup wizard for organization creation, staff import, area definition, and product catalog initialization.

prd.problemStatement: New users need to set up their course quickly without overwhelming complexity. A guided wizard streamlines the essential setup steps.
userStories: As a new user, I want a setup wizard so that I can get started quickly
As a new user, I want to import staff from CSV so that I don't have to enter each person manually
